verses.t: Now these were the sons{H1121} of David{H1732}, which were born{H3205} unto him in Hebron{H2275}; the firstborn{H1060} Amnon{H550}, of Ahinoam{H293} the Jezreelitess{H3159}; the second{H8145} Daniel{H1840}, of Abigail{H26} the Carmelitess{H3762}:Daniel: or, Chileab
The third{H7992}, Absalom{H53} the son{H1121} of Maachah{H4601} the daughter{H1323} of Talmai{H8526} king{H4428} of Geshur{H1650}: the fourth{H7243}, Adonijah{H138} the son{H1121} of Haggith{H2294}:
The fifth{H2549}, Shephatiah{H8203} of Abital{H37}: the sixth{H8345}, Ithream{H3507} by Eglah{H5698} his wife{H802}.

These six{H8337} were born{H3205} unto him in Hebron{H2275}; and there he reigned{H4427} seven{H7651} years{H8141} and six{H8337} months{H2320}: and in Jerusalem{H3389} he reigned{H4427} thirty{H7970} and three{H7969} years{H8141}.

And these were born{H3205} unto him in Jerusalem{H3389}; Shimea{H8092}, and Shobab{H7727}, and Nathan{H5416}, and Solomon{H8010}, four{H702}, of Bath–shua{H1340} the daughter{H1323} of Ammiel{H5988}:Shimea: or, ShammuaBath–shua: or, Bath–shebaAmmiel: or, Eliam
Ibhar{H2984} also, and Elishama{H476}, and Eliphelet{H467},Elishama: also called, Elishua
And Nogah{H5052}, and Nepheg{H5298}, and Japhia{H3309},
And Elishama{H476}, and Eliada{H450}, and Eliphelet{H467}, nine{H8672}.Eliada: or, Beeliada
These were all the sons{H1121} of David{H1732}, beside the sons{H1121} of the concubines{H6370}, and Tamar{H8559} their sister{H269}.
And Solomon's{H8010} son{H1121} was Rehoboam{H7346}, Abia{H29} his son{H1121}, Asa{H609} his son{H1121}, Jehoshaphat{H3092} his son{H1121},Abia: or, Abijam
Joram{H3141} his son{H1121}, Ahaziah{H274} his son{H1121}, Joash{H3101} his son{H1121},Ahaziah: or, Azariah
Amaziah{H558} his son{H1121}, Azariah{H5838} his son{H1121}, Jotham{H3147} his son{H1121},Azariah: or, Uzziah
Ahaz{H271} his son{H1121}, Hezekiah{H2396} his son{H1121}, Manasseh{H4519} his son{H1121},
Amon{H526} his son{H1121}, Josiah{H2977} his son{H1121}.

And the sons{H1121} of Josiah{H2977} were, the firstborn{H1060} Johanan{H3110}, the second{H8145} Jehoiakim{H3079}, the third{H7992} Zedekiah{H6667}, the fourth{H7243} Shallum{H7967}.Johanan: or, JehoahazJehoiakim: or, EliakimZedekiah: or, Mattaniah
And the sons{H1121} of Jehoiakim{H3079}: Jeconiah{H3204} his son{H1121}, Zedekiah{H6667} his son{H1121}.Jeconiah: also called, Jehoiachin or Coniah
And the sons{H1121} of Jeconiah{H3204}; Assir{H617}, Salathiel{H7597} his son{H1121},Salathiel: Heb. Shealtiel
Malchiram{H4443} also, and Pedaiah{H6305}, and Shenazar{H8137}, Jecamiah{H3359}, Hoshama{H1953}, and Nedabiah{H5072}.

And the sons{H1121} of Pedaiah{H6305} were, Zerubbabel{H2216}, and Shimei{H8096}: and the sons{H1121} of Zerubbabel{H2216}; Meshullam{H4918}, and Hananiah{H2608}, and Shelomith{H8019} their sister{H269}:
And Hashubah{H2807}, and Ohel{H169}, and Berechiah{H1296}, and Hasadiah{H2619}, Jushab–hesed{H3142}, five{H2568}.

And the sons{H1121} of Hananiah{H2608}; Pelatiah{H6410}, and Jesaiah{H3470}: the sons{H1121} of Rephaiah{H7509}, the sons{H1121} of Arnan{H770}, the sons{H1121} of Obadiah{H5662}, the sons{H1121} of Shechaniah{H7935}.

And the sons{H1121} of Shechaniah{H7935}; Shemaiah{H8098}: and the sons{H1121} of Shemaiah{H8098}; Hattush{H2407}, and Igeal{H3008}, and Bariah{H1282}, and Neariah{H5294}, and Shaphat{H8202}, six{H8337}.
And the sons{H1121} of Neariah{H5294}; Elioenai{H454}, and Hezekiah{H2396}, and Azrikam{H5840}, three{H7969}.Hezekiah: Heb. Hiskijah
And the sons{H1121} of Elioenai{H454} were, Hodaiah{H1939}, and Eliashib{H475}, and Pelaiah{H6411}, and Akkub{H6126}, and Johanan{H3110}, and Dalaiah{H1806}, and Anani{H6054}, seven{H7651}.
